item.title: [F#] Dev Life's Little Pleasures
item.description: Different languages have some little things that make the life easier: for devs, their QAs and customers. The app is fast and behaves correctly, the code looks simple and understandable - everyone is happy. Here are the slides and a couple of code samples from my talk “[F#] Dev Life’s Little Pleasures”. Briefly, it takes some real-world problems 1 and provides the simple solutions. Units of Measure - need to admit, I was a long time sceptic (c’mon, how can you get kg and m^2 mixed up?
